scenes.description: Nerissa Ravencroft performs the song 'Meltdown' (炉心融解) as part of her 3D concert musical.
Instrumental transition featuring a glowing rose changing from red to blue.
MC segment where Nerissa greets the audience, explains the musical concept, and showcases the 3D stage details and her wings.

subtitles.original: Allegro agitate
subtitles.english: Allegro agitate

subtitles.original: 耳鳴りが消えない　止まない
subtitles.english: The ringing in my ears won't stop, it won't go away

subtitles.original: 誰も皆消えていく夢を見た
subtitles.english: I had a dream where the whole entire world disappeared

subtitles.original: 真夜中の部屋の広さと静寂が
subtitles.english: Tonight, I'm swallowed by the vastness of my dark room

subtitles.original: 胸につかえて
subtitles.english: Yet, silence closes in and suffocates me

subtitles.original: 上手に息ができなくなる
subtitles.english: My lungs can't find the air I need to breath

subtitles.original: 核融合炉にさ　飛び込んでみたいと思う
subtitles.english: If I could throw myself into a nuclear reactor

subtitles.original: そしたらきっと眠るように　消えていけるんだ
subtitles.english: Then I could finally fade away, as easily as closing my eyes to sleep

subtitles.original: 僕のいない朝は　今よりずっと素晴らしくて
subtitles.english: A new dawn without me would surely be dazzling new day

subtitles.original: 全ての歯車が噛み合った
subtitles.english: All of the gears would be turning together in harmony

subtitles.original: きっとそんな世界だ
subtitles.english: Surely, that's how the world would be
